      • generateImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage generateImage(java.lang.String code)
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Package-private method that generates a QR code from text. Needs to be available to package for unit testing.
        Parameters:
        code - - code to use for generating QR code
        Returns:
        BufferedImage holding the QR Code.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • verifyParkingCode

        public static boolean verifyParkingCode(java.lang.String location,
                                        java.lang.String site,
                                        java.lang.String qrCode)
        Verifies parking code is correct for a given QR Image
        Parameters:
        location - - location of the code
        site - - site of the code
        qrCode - - the full code fetched from the QR Image
        Returns:
        - boolean representing if the code matched what is in the database.

      • fetchCode

        private static java.lang.String fetchCode(java.lang.String location,
                                          java.lang.String site)
        Fetches the uuid code currently representing the parking lot
        Parameters:
        location - - the location of the parking lot
        site - - the parking lot site
        Returns:
        A UUID in string format representing the parking lot

      • rotateCode

        public static void rotateCode(java.lang.String location,
                              java.lang.String site)
        Rotates a QR Code and image. Occurs every time someone successfully accesses a parking site.
        Parameters:
        location - - location of the site rotating a code
        site - - the site where the code needs to be rotated
